Projects.Title: Projects
Projects.Description: Here are some of my projects.

web.Title: Development
web.Description: Here are some of the projects I've developed.
web.Description1: One of the first projects I developed, using beginner techniques. The task was to create a store, with a login page, shopping cart, and support.
web.Description2: School project where we had to develop a site with carousels, dark mode, and several pages. It was supposed to simulate a store or computer parts manufacturer. It was my first React project.
web.Description3: Started as a school project, my first portfolio evolved into the professional page you're on right now! It was my second pure React project.
web.Description4: School project where we had to develop a site with carousels, dark mode, and several pages. It was supposed to simulate a store or computer parts manufacturer. It was my first React project.
web.Description5: FullStack project made with NextJS and TypeScript, incorporating Tailwind, ShadCN, and Stripe, with a MySQL database.
web.Description6: ERP made with NextJS and TypeScript for the E-commerce project, offering complete store management. Libraries like Clerk, Cloudinary, and ShadCN were used.

3D.Title: 3D Models and Prints
3D.Description: All models that are not my own creation are licensed and permitted for sale.
